sentence: Donald Trump will hold a fundraiser at his Mar-A-Lago resort in Florida next month to benefit former Sen. David Perdue in his campaign to oust Georgia's governor, Brian Kemp.
title: Conor Lamb makes his contrast argument for Pennsylvania Senate bid

author: Tal Axelrod
title: Trump to hold fundraiser, rally for Georgia governor candidate Perdue

sentence: It also finds the Republicans running for governor, incumbent Brian Kemp and former Sen. David Perdue, outpacing Democrat Stacey Abrams 49-44 and 47-45, respectively.
title: Morning Digest: Join us for our liveblog tonight as the 2022 primaries get underway in Texas

sentence: AZ-Gov: Katie Hobbs (D): $750,000 raised; Marco Lpez (D): $450,000 raised; Kari Lake (R): $970,000 raised, $700,000 cash-on-hand NV-Gov: Joe Lombardo (R): $824,000 raised, $3 million cash-on-hand; Fred Simon (R): $1.3 million self-loaned Friday, Apr 15, 2022 7:48:40 PM +00:00 Stephen Wolf GA-Gov: Polling on behalf of local CBS affiliate WGCL, Landmark Communications surveyed the May 24 Republican primary for governor and finds incumbent Brian Kemp holding a dominant 52-28 lead over former Sen. David Perdue, with 10% going to educator Kandiss Taylor.
title: Daily Kos Elections Live Digest: 4/15
